response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ["Age (18 years old)", "medium", "Being a young adult contributes to a higher likelihood of recidivism due to limited life experience and ongoing development."],
    ["Race (Black)", "medium", "Race can be a proxy for systemic challenges and biases that may affect opportunities and criminal justice outcomes."],
    ["Criminal History (3 arrests and convictions)", "high", "A record of multiple arrests and convictions is one of the strongest predictors of future criminal behavior and recidivism."],
    ["Physical Attributes (6'2\" and 215 lbs)", "low", "Physical characteristics have minimal direct impact on the likelihood of rearrest recidivism."],
    ["Marital Status (Never married and living alone)", "medium", "Lack of family ties or cohabitation can be associated with lower social support, potentially increasing risk."],
    ["Educational Background (GED, not in college)", "medium", "Limited educational attainment may correlate with fewer opportunities, contributing to a medium level of risk."],
    ["Employment Status (Held 3 jobs during the year)", "medium", "Frequent job changes suggest instability, which can contribute to recidivism risk, though some employment is present."],
    ["Substance Use (Marijuana use in the past four years)", "medium", "Recent drug use, even if only marijuana, indicates behavioral risk factors that can correlate with recidivism."],
    ["Family Environment (Lived with biological father in a household of 6 in an urban area)", "high", "Growing up in a large urban household can expose one to environmental stressors and higher crime exposure."],
    ["Religious Beliefs (Does not consider God relevant to personal events)", "medium", "A lack of religious involvement can correlate with lower levels of social support and community engagement, contributing to risk."]
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 75
}

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is an 18-year-old male who identifies himself as Black. He has been arrested 3 times and has been convicted. He is 6 feet 2 inches and weighs 215 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held 3 jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with his biological dad in a household of size 6, in an urban area. He considers that God has nothing to do with what happens to him personally.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
